'''0.0.15a''' (Multiplayer Test 4) is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 3, 2009, at 19:00 UTC.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[13:00] <@Notch> ok, restart your clients now. =)''" (19:00 UTC)</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Controls]]'''
* Building and destroying is now less laggy.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[13:01] <@Notch> try building and removing now. =)''" [...] "''[13:01] <@Notch> it should be much less laggy''" (19:01 UTC)</ref>

'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Added visible usernames above players.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[13:01] <smn> OH INGAME NICKS''" (19:01 UTC)</ref>
* Particles have been re-added to multiplayer.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[13:02] <smn> ohhh particlez''" (19:02 UTC)</ref>
